messages.subject: Need a URL or Two Quick!
messages.msgSnippet: I noticed the following post on my local Freecycle list.  I offered a website resource, and they agreed.  I need one or two sites that won t scare off someone
messages.messageBody:
I noticed the following post on my local Freecycle list. I offered a
website resource, and they agreed. I need one or two sites that won't
scare off someone completely new to the idea of unschooling.

Please reply directly to my email (you can copy to the list as well, if
desired) as I'm on digest and would rather get a response to this mom
right away.

---COPIED MESSAGE FOLLOWS---

I have a huge family and with no good help from my childhood, we need
help knowing ideas to do with the kids. Like exp:
How to keep home life in order?
How to help kids with homework?
How to help kids adjust to having two homes?
How much tv is to much?
How much should kids get out doors to play?
How to be a PTA mom?
Things of this sort in any parenting book would be great. I can learn
from most any book. Thanks in advance for the HUGE help!

---END COPIED MESSAGE---

--
Andrea L. Roher
Searching for my place in "Life, the Universe, and Everything" one day at
a time.
... maybe I've finally found it in NH! (www.FreeStateProject.org)
Visit my blog at evenstar75.blogspot.com.
